text: “Nɨ kamaghɨn damigh gɨvagh, egh ragh uan agharir kɨriam moghɨn mɨtogh, 390plan dughiabar irɨghɨv ikɨ arazir kurar Israelia amizibar osɨmtɨzibar ivezir kuram ateram. Kɨ 390plan dughiaba nɨ ganɨngi, ezɨ dughiar kaba Israelɨn ikɨzim osɨmtɨzir me ini ikiamim, a 390plan azenibar dɨbobonim ko magh ghu. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, nɨ bar dughiar ruarir kamɨn me amizir arazir kurabar osɨmtɨzim iniam.
